Articles.Content: Can Squad please make a "capture the asteroid" mission in career mode ?
And some more asteroid contracts offcourse (get asteroid in orbit around the Mun, Minmus, land one on Eve, that kinda stuf)

And some more asteroid contracts offcourse (get asteroid in orbit around the Mun, Minmus, land one on Eve, that kinda stuf)

^ That. so many thats.

*facepalm*

Why... Why didn't they implement this initially??? Such a simple idea, and gives asteroids more value... Next we'll be able to recover them on Kerbin for money (different amounts due to asteroid size)

*facepalm*

Why... Why didn't they implement this initially??? Such a simple idea, and gives asteroids more value... Next we'll be able to recover them on Kerbin for money (different amounts due to asteroid size)

Ooo I like that.

An alternative source of income

You guy realize they probably didn't added it yet because they were more busy coding of the feature itself than creating contents for it ?

That will probably be done later, and even if it isn't crazy enough some modder will add insane missions themselves. (like land an huge asteroid over the mission control center)

You guy realize they probably didn't added it yet because they were more busy coding of the feature itself than creating contents for it ?

That will probably be done later, and even if it isn't crazy enough some modder will add insane missions themselves. (like land an huge asteroid over the mission control center)

You do realize that what we're doing here is the exact reason why there is a suggestions forum right?

It hasn't been added yet, so we suggest they add it later
Of course, I'm just cynic about how dramatic "Random Tank" was with its *facepalm*.
